description: A comprehensive instruction/opcode table.

name: Delay timer test
description: Test program that checks the delay timer's behavior.

description: Test program that checks the spread and mask for random number generation.

name: Octo
description: An IDE for development of CHIP-8, Super-CHIP and XO-Chip games.

name: Emma02
description: An emulator for many old microcomputers, including COSMAC VIP, Telmac 1800 and ETI 660, which ran early CHIP-8 interpreters (which are included in the emulator).

name: Super-Chip8x
description: CHIP-8 emulator for the SNES.

name: CHIP-8 console on FPGA
description: A CHIP-8 emulator for the TinyFPGA BX chip.

name: Vinegar
description: CHIP-8/Super-CHIP interpreter for TI-83 (Plus) calculators.

name: LowResNX
description: CHIP-8 interpreter and debugger programmed in BASIC inside another retro fantasy console.

name: Octo
description: A high-level assembler for CHIP-8, Super-CHIP and XO-CHIP, complete with an environment for testing programs, and tools for sharing your creations.

name: wernsey chip8
description: A CHIP-8 assembler/disassembler.

name: EZ-Bake Animator
description: A graphics preparation tool that creates XOR-ed animations.

name: EZ-Writer
description: A tool for converting text into CHIP-8 sprites.

name: EZ-Pack
description: An image slicing/repaletting tool.

name: Chipify
description: A script that filters and encodes mono-channel WAV audio to XO-CHIP audio.

name: octofont
description: Convert TrueType (ttf) fonts to Octo code for CHIP-8.

description: The manual for Octo.

description: An introductory guide to CHIP-8 programming in Octo.

name: Chip8 Programming Techniques
description: Many different programming tips for CHIP-8.

name: Mastering SuperChip
description: How to make games compatible with CHIP-8 and Super-CHIP, as well as some Super-CHIP specific techniques.

name: Adventures in Sorting
description: Implementing efficient sorting algorithms in Octo for CHIP-8.

description: Multiplication routines for CHIP-8, written in Octo.

description: A collection of public domain (CC0) games, all playable online.
